about_the_game:
Under the command of the master, clear out the monsters that threaten humanity. In the perilous land of monsters, engage in intense battles with them. "Monster Battle" is an exhilarating combat and survival rogue game. Grow stronger during battles, collect and purchase powerful artifacts and equipment that you like to confront stronger monsters. There are also various skill combinations in battle. Challenge different monster bosses with powerful artifacts and weapons. Each battle will be a different and exhilarating experience.

******* The space bar (handle A) is for invincible roll, the F key (handle RT) is for releasing skills************************

The game has been adapted for GPD and handheld consoles, and perfectly supports handles. I hope handheld players will also have a good gaming experience.

Spacebar is used to roll to evade attacks and obstacles. Different weapons have different effects, and when combined with appropriate clothing, players can adapt to different boss encounters according to their needs. When facing a large number of enemies and sudden boss attacks, it will provide a unique survivor experience.

The game consists of 3 linear levels, 5 selectable stages, and a final challenge stage. Defeating bosses will grant you equipment and a large amount of gold, which can be used to purchase items in the shop. Later bosses and monsters in the game have elemental damage, so remember to equip the corresponding resistance gear to counter them.

Rolling consumes stamina but helps evade monster attacks.


The game offers various powerful equipment and weapons, which can be obtained by purchasing from the shop or defeating bosses. Pay attention to your gold coins, as there is a penalty for losing.


Undead weapons have a chance to summon a legion of zombies to assist you after killing enemies. Utilize undead equipment and summoning skills to defeat enemies with your legion.
